America must be filled with morons, he said about Jay Leno 's fans who tune in every night. ''I don't like Jay Leno personally,'' Howard Stern said. After acknowledging that he's been a keen observer of the late-night battle for many years, Howard Stern suggested that he supports David Letterman because he has a personal distaste for Jay Leno . You know as well as everyone in this room, Jay Leno is horrible, he asserted. '' Jay Leno 's got no talent.''
